articles.title: Short-term Air Pollution increases risk of positivity of COVID-19 infection: JAMA - Medical Dialogues
articles.description: A new study published in the Journal of American Medical Association shows that short-term exposure...
articles.content: A new study published in the Journal of American Medical Association shows that short-term exposure to particulate matter and Black Carbon (BC) was linked to a higher chance of positive SARS-CoV-2 PC… [+2499 chars]

articles.author: Jen Christensen
articles.title: US air quality report finds a sharp uptick in pollution, with the hardest-hit cities in California - CNN
articles.description: The US saw the highest number of "very unhealthy" and "hazardous" air quality days between 2018 and 2020 than it ever had before, according to a report released Thursday by the American Lung Association.
articles.content: The US saw the highest number of very unhealthy and hazardous air quality days between 2018 and 2020 than it ever had before, according to a report released Thursday by the American Lung Association.… [+4570 chars]
